java._comment: Only classes with javax.ws.rs annotations are included since we want to check only REST API.

packages.comment: We don't want to check transitive classes, e.g. from kie-server-api, since we already check them in their own module.

classes._comment: Classes are excluded, not included, so new classes in future are discovered by revapi.

revapi._comment: Changes between 7.39.0.Final and the current branch. These changes are desired and thus ignored.
